contexts.context: ...Suran, Seyda Neen, Balmora, and Molag Mar. <mark>Ships</mark> from the docks at the Foreign Quarter travel to Ebonheart,...
..., Hla Oad, Molag Mar, and Tel Branora. <mark>Ships</mark> from nearby Ebonheart sail to Hla Oad, Sadrith Mora,...
...at the Mages Guild. Gals Arethi at the docks offers <mark>ship</mark> passage to Ebonheart, Tel Branora, Tel Mora, or...
...Redaynia and Dagon Fel. Only Dagon Fel is reached by <mark>ship</mark> services; all other island-to-island transport must be provided...
